Author: stopandbelieve
Text: Yes, but I don’t think it lasts, that’s the issue

Author: snefferu
Text: It’s better to do less “bad things” than it is to do more “bad things”! Well done for cutting down. Keep challenging yourself though, as soon as you feel ready try to cut down a little more. Don’t push yourself too hard but if you know you could do a little less of the “bad things” you’ll know, just try it and you’ll feel even better :) good luck!
